title: [40. Combination Sum II](https://leetcode.cn/problems/combination-sum-ii/)
content:
| English | 简体中文 |
40. Combination Sum II Description Given a collection of candidate numbers (candidates) and a target number (target), find all unique combinations in candidates where the candidate numbers sum to target.
Each number in candidates may only be used once in the combination.
Note: The solution set must not contain duplicate combinations.
 
Example 1:
Input: candidates = [10,1,2,7,6,1,5], target = 8 Output: [ [1,1,6], [1,2,5], [1,7], [2,6] ] Example 2:
Input: candidates = [2,5,2,1,2], target = 5 Output: [ [1,2,2], [5] ]  
Constraints:
1 <= candidates.length <= 100 1 <= candidates[i] <= 50 1 <= target <= 30 Related Topics Array Backtracking Similar Questions Combination Sum
